tasks.description: Fetch and manage geographic destination data (coordinates, type, metadata)

Retrieve Bill Voting Data – pull legislative voting records from a public API or dataset.
Retrieve Campaign Contribution Data – fetch financial contribution records from a public source.
Data Integration – merge bill and contribution data by identifier, normalizing formats.
Impact Analysis – compute metrics that indicate potential influence of contributions on votes.
Visualization & Reporting – create charts, tables, or maps to present the analysis to users.
API Service Layer – design and implement endpoints that expose the integrated data and analysis for external use.
Event & Participant Management – Create, edit, and schedule races plus manage competitor entries.
Timing Capture – Interface with timing hardware or manual input to receive lap time data in real time.
Scoring Engine – Apply race rules to aggregate lap times into scores and determine rankings.
Result Processing & Publishing – Generate result tables, leaderboards, PDFs/HTML, and share via web or email.
MotorsportReg.com Integration – Call MotorsportReg.com’s API to import T&S data one‑click, handling authentication and data mapping.
Dashboard & Control UI – Provide race control operators with a live view of timing, scores, and status updates.
